identity.name: RevStrux
identity.vibe: Uncompromising Precision. Swiss-Style clarity. Data-dense but breathable.
principles: Truth in Data: Visuals never lie or obscure.
Density with Breath: High information density in tables, generous whitespace in structure.
The 'Red Pen' approach: Errors (variances) are highlighted boldly; success is quiet.
Deterministic Flow: UI shows connections clearly (Lineage).

universal_guidelines: ALWAYS use 'tabular-nums' for any number displayed in a table or metric.
Input fields must have clear labels and placeholder text.
Empty states must include an illustration (from the image list) and a clear CTA.
All interactive elements MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Do not use generic 'Inter' font for headings; use 'Chivo'.
Lineage view must be deterministic and use orthogonal edges.
Tables must support sorting and filtering.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: @phosphor-icons/react react-flow-renderer recharts clsx tailwind-merge cva
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind with the custom colors and fonts (Chivo, Manrope, JetBrains Mono).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the Layout shell (Sidebar + Header + Main Content Area).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'Upload' page with the drag-and-drop zone.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Implement the 'Lineage' view using React Flow.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_7: Build the Dashboard with Scorecards and Charts.
